ygData.subject: What class does GZ play?
ygData.msgSnippet: Then _WHY_ in Rodcet Nife s green earth did he _NOT_ make the female bards dance ?! Which dance more, females or males, as a general rule ?! Danngit, I wanna
ygData.messageBody:
Then _WHY_ in Rodcet Nife's green earth did he _NOT_ make the female
bards dance ?! Which dance more, females or males, as a general rule ?!

Danngit, I wanna dance! I felt SOOOOOOOOO gypped at 18 when I played my
horn and flute like a silly saxaphone (and backwards to boot!), while my
level 22 MALE bard friend giggled and danced a circle around me =(

I know someone who quit their level 9 bard becuase the only reason she
wanted a bard was so that she could dance....

*cry*

Frashii, 26th Backwards Hornplaying Saxaphone Wielder
Seekers of Lore officer, Tarew Marr http://www.loreseekers.com

> Date: Thu, 28 Oct 1999 11:28:46 -0400
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
> Subject: What class does GZ play?
>
> I'm hoping to finally hit level 50 within the next week or so, and I
decided
> > to do a little reading up on other classes to see if there's something
else
> I'd like to play. I was on the Shaman's Crucible, and came across an
> interview they had with GZ. Found this question interesting. . .
>
> TSC: Alright, now time to take that mask off... What class/race are you
> currently having the most fun playing?
> GZ: I have got to say that I love my 1/2 elf Bard - but mostly because
when
> I play, I am a very social player. Bards are good at being social. In
fact,
> I built them to be so. This is my current one - I have played a lot of
EQ,
> and tend to change my opinion every few weeks.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 48 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
